meanings.definition: The quality of being delicious or pleasing to the taste.
meanings.sent1: The yumminess of the cake made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: I love the yumminess of fresh strawberries.
meanings.sent3: The yumminess of the pizza was so good, it made me dance.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking always has a touch of yumminess that brightens my day.
meanings.sent5: The yumminess of the chocolate melted in my mouth like happiness.

meanings.definition: A feeling of enjoyment or satisfaction derived from eating something tasty.
meanings.sent1: The yumminess of the ice cream brought pure joy to the kids.
meanings.sent2: She savored the yumminess of the warm soup on a cold day.
meanings.sent3: His face lit up with yumminess after tasting the homemade cookies.
meanings.sent4: The yumminess of the burger was like a party in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: I can't resist the yumminess of a perfectly ripe peach.
